item.description:
UPDATE:  Seems a certain quarterback is out for the season for his non-winning team. ;) Eh, may be another blowout but it's the PATRIOTS baby! Still gotta root them on! GAME TIME IS 1:00PM but come early to get prime seating!

Four Green Fields, http://fourgreenfields.com/homepage.php, has agree to host us and is reserving the large space right in front of their 20 foot HD screen. FREE APPETIZERS while they last!

Four Green Fields is conveniently located near all T lines but closest to State on the Orange and Blue Lines.  Parking is available at the Pi Alley Garage located on Washington Street. 

Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink.  PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO.  REMEMBER TO TIP YOUR SERVER!!

This event is cross-listed with Red Sox Natives and Social Fun. 

Hope to see you there!

P.S.  The first person who shows up in a "I HATE PEYTON" t-shirt get a free beer on me! ;)
item.how_to_find_us: Reserved area near the large HD screen
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party - Patriots vs. Indianapolis Colts
